casebody.data:
Domenic A. PREVITE & another,1 trustees,2
v.
JIANFENG HE.3 18-P-661 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 17, 2019

The portion of the final judgment entered on February 27, 2018, in favor of the defendant on the count for conversion is reversed, and judgment shall enter for the plaintiffs on that judgment affirmed.
